items.title: You’ve been targeted by government spyware. Now what?
items.description: Tech companies are increasingly warning their customers that they have been targeted by governments with advanced government spyware, such as NSO's Pe...

items.title: Sauron, the high-end home security startup for “super premium” customers, plucks a new CEO out of Sonos
items.description: Sauron is appearing on the scene as concerns rise about crime among the most wealthy.

items.title: Police charge driver who allegedly killed a pedestrian while livestreaming on TikTok
items.description: Local police said they have charged an Illinois driver who struck and killed a pedestrian while she was livestreaming on TikTok.

items.title: You may soon be able to change your Gmail address
items.description: Good news for anyone tired of or embarrassed by their current Gmail address.

items.title: A guide to choosing the right Apple Watch
items.description: The gap between Apple's standard and budget smart watches has never felt smaller.
